name: alt-text-auto-fill
description: Automatically generates alt text for images to improve web accessibility
author: Software for Progress Foundation

scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.zip: cd dist/unpacked && zip -r ../alt-text-auto-fill.zip * && cd ../.. && zip -r dist/alt-text-auto-fill-source.zip src scripts package.json README.md
